description.3: SPIN THE WHEEL, AND WIN FREESPINS!

left.description: THE NUMBER OF FREESPINS WILL BE CREDITED TO EGT INTERACTIVE SLOT – ZODIAC WHEEL

right.description: THE NUMBER OF FREESPINS WILL BE DISPLAYED ON YOUR PLINKO MAX FREESPINS BALANCE

freespins-text: DURING THE RAFFLE, CLICK ON THE "GET FREESPINS" BUTTON AND GET TICKETS CORRESPONDING TO THE NUMBER OF TICKETS YOU HAVE COLLECTED
live-auth-popup: ფრისპინების მისაღებად აუცილებელია გაიარო ავტორიზაცია ან რეგისტრაცია

live-info-popup.1: If you have collected 300 tickets in the current day’s raffle and you click on the button "get freespins" during the raffle, you will be credited 300 EGT freespins;
live-info-popup.2: During a day you can get min. 10 and max. 500 EGT freespins;
live-info-popup.3: Freespins will be credited until 16:00 of the next day;
live-info-popup.4: In the weekly raffle, you will be credited freespins of 0.5₾ in 10 BURNING HEART;
live-info-popup.5: In the final raffle, you will be credited freespins of 1₾ in 20 DAZZLING HOT;
live-info-popup.6: Tickets collected in sports do not participate in receiving freespins;
live-info-popup.7: *Freespins will be credited to the first 2 000 users who will click on the "Get freespins" button.

pr-popup.p1: YOU CAN COMPLETE THE PROGRESS BAR WITH THE TOTAL BETS PLACED IN PLINKO MAX.
pr-popup.p2: E.G. IF YOU PLACE A TOTAL BET OF  500₾ IN PLINKO MAX WITHIN A DAY,  IT WILL BE DISPLAYED ON THE PROGRESS BAR AS 500₾.

wh-popup.1: YOU CAN SPIN THE WHEEL UP TO FIVE TIMES PER DAY.
wh-popup.2: IF YOU FAIL TO SPIN THE WHEEL DURING THE DAY, YOUR COLLECTED POINTS WILL RESET AND CANNOT BE CARRIED OVER TO THE NEXT DAY;
wh-popup.3: * YOU CAN SPIN THE WHEEL EVERY DAY, AND THE DAILY COUNT STARTS AT 10:00 AND ENDS AT 09:59

live-range-popup.2: WATCH THE LIVE RAFFLE TOMORROW AT 22:00 AND WIN EGT FREESPINS

live-submited-popup: YOU HAVE ALREADY GOT THE PRIZE OF THE DAY!
